title: Rachid Hechiche
text:
Rachid Hechiche is a French <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> at the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>.
Playing career.
Hechiche played for the <a href="Lyon%20Villeurbanne">Lyon Villeurbanne</a> club in the local <a href="French%20Rugby%20League%20Championship">French Rugby League Championship</a>. He made his international debut for <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">France</a> in the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>, playing in four matches. In 2001 he was part of the <a href="2001%20French%20rugby%20league%20tour%20of%20New%20Zealand%20and%20Papua%20New%20Guinea">French tour of New Zealand and Papua New Guinea</a>. He last played for France in 2003.
